titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Defense to submit to Congress an annual report on the funding and status of interim remedial actions of the Department of Defense relating to perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances, and for other purposes.

To amend title 10, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Defense to submit to Congress an annual report on the funding and status of interim remedial actions of the Department of Defense relating to perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
